name: Anti-Virus Rampage
description:
Submission to the https://itch.io/jam/mini-jame-gam-13 by https://tiimo.itch.io/ and https://franklyfied.itch.io/. 

I ran into some serius problems translating my idear. I was not able to make it multy platform.

The game requiers some access to your harddrives. This might be blocked by your sandbox.
